title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7030.2 - Non-English speaking prisoners
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7030.2 - Non-English speaking prisoners

State Regulations

Each local correctional facility shall employ procedures
designed to reasonably ensure that non-English speaking prisoners understand
all written and oral communications from facility staff members, including but
not limited to orientation procedures, health services procedures, facility
rules and disciplinary procedures, and the provisions of this

Subtitle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7030.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
